ResearchProjectDef.label: Gnollstrom Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: There's a difference between professionally made things and homebrew hackjobs. This increase in functionality comes with that amateurish look, especially when made out of second-hand parts. Gnollstrom bionics are better.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gnollstrom Mechanics
ResearchProjectDef.description: A box of screwdrivers and wrenches are one thing, but when you need an autosocket to cut down wrenching time or a handheld laser lathe to do on-the-fly material shifting, that's another set of tools entirely.
